mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (comment_pk, article_pk, member_pk, comment_content) VALUES (seq_comment_pk.NEXTVAL, #{articlePk}, #{memberPk}, #{commentContent})
INSERT INTO tbl_comment (comment_pk, member_pk, comment_content, originate_comment) VALUES (seq_comment_pk.NEXTVAL, #{memberPk}, #{commentContent}, #{originateComment})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.comment_pk, c.member_pk, m.nickname, c.comment_content, c.like_count, c.dislike_count, c.is_deleted FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_member m ON c.member_pk = m.member_pk WHERE c.article_pk = #{articlePk} AND c.comment_pk > #{lastCommentPk} ORDER BY c.created_dttm ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{fetchCount} + 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.comment_pk, c.member_pk, m.nickname, c.comment_content, c.like_count, c.dislike_count, c.is_deleted FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_member m ON c.member_pk = m.member_pk WHERE c.article_pk = #{articlePk} AND c.like_count > 0 ORDER BY c.like_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{fetchCount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.comment_pk, c.member_pk, m.nickname, c.comment_content, c.like_count, c.dislike_count, c.is_deleted FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_member m ON c.member_pk = m.member_pk WHERE c.originate_comment = #{originateComment} AND c.comment_pk > #{lastCommentPk} ORDER BY c.created_dttm ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{fetchCount} + 1

SELECT c.comment_pk, c.comment_content, c.created_dttm, c.article_pk FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_article a ON c.article_pk = a.article_pk WHERE c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.member_pk = #{memberPk} AND a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.comment_pk DESC FETCH FIRST #{size} + 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.comment_pk, c.comment_content, c.created_dttm, c.article_pk FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_article a ON c.article_pk = a.article_pk WHERE c.comment_pk < #{lastCommentPk} AND c.member_pk = #{memberPk} AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.comment_pk DESC FETCH FIRST #{size} + 1 ROWS ONLY
